title: Johnny Chimpo
description: A television animated series from Afghanistan. Johnny Chimpo is a monkey who travels around the world doing nasty things. His butler tries to keep him in line and untempted by Western culture.
altHero: Johnny Chimpo, a monkey in a cutoff tshirt and hat, gives a thumbs up while riding a donkey
alt1: a round red bird with narrow beak
alt3: Johnny on the kicking donkey, the red bird flies nearby, and a butler calls out from a balcony
alt4: the butler with monocole, mustache, and cane
